snippet.title: Airport CEO Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Airport CEO is a tycoon and management game where you take seat as the CEO of your own airport. You will build the airport’s infrastructure with everything from runways to restaurants and check-in. Manage resources by hiring employees, signing contracts and making sure that the budget holds.

Airport CEO has been in development since 2015 and released as an Early Access title on Steam in September 2017.

This video shows in-game footage recorded on a Windows PC (Intel Core i7 2600K, 16 GB MHz DDR3, GeForce GTX 560TI) captured with ShareX (unoptimized, no TV-box) and on on an early 2015 MacBook Pro (2,6 Ghz Intel Core i5, 8 GB MHz DDR3, Intel Iris Graphics 6100 1536 MB). The video appears choppier than it actully is due to lack of proper recording equipment. 

Watch the first gameplay video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xO0E...

Watch the second gameplay video here: https://youtu.be/1gsIwim_E04

Watch the third gameplay video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NRlbeeBlWSA&t=569s

Follow our development process at:

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/673610/Airport_CEO/
Website: https://www.airportceo.com/
DevLog: https://www.airportceo.com/blog
Forum: https://forum.airportceo.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AirportCEO
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/airportceo
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/airportceo/
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/airport-ceo
